title: Call of Duty Black Ops 2 Download Direct
description:
Call of Duty: Black Ops 2 + multiplayer is a traditional first-person shooter that continues the events of the first part. Now you have to continue the war against terrorists , plunge into even more fateful events, and do much, much more The events of the game take place some time after the finale of the first part of “Black Ops”. Well, you will play for David Mason, the son of the protagonist of the previous game, Alex Mason. In his role, you will have to embark on another difficult mission, fight numerous terrorists
But at the same time it is written in such a way that it seems that the player influences events by his actions. Pushing the boundaries of what fans have come to expect from the record-setting entertainment franchise, Call of Duty®: Black Ops II propels players into a near future, 21st Century Cold War, where technology and weapons have converged to create a new generation of warfare .

system_requirements.OS: Windows Vista SP2 or Windows 7. Windows XP is not supported
system_requirements.Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E8200 2.66 GHz or AMD Phenom X3 8750 2.4 GHz
system_requirements.Memory: 2 GB for 32-bit OS or 4 GB for 64-bit OS
system_requirements.Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 8800GT 512 MB or ATI Radeon HD 3870 512 MB
